mapper.select: select * from system_user where username = #{username} limit 0,1

select su.id, su.username, su.status, group_concat(sur.role_code) role_codes, group_concat(sr.role_name) role_names from system_user su left join system_user_role sur on sur.user_id = su.id left join system_role sr on sr.role_code = sur.role_code
su.username like concat('%', #{condition.usernameLike}, '%') and su.status = #{condition.status}
and exists ( select 1 from system_user_role t where t.user_id = su.id and t.role_code = #{condition.roleCode} )
group by su.id, su.username, su.status order by su.status desc, su.create_time desc
